articles.title: AG Campbell skeptical of proposed law to ban ICE agents from wearing masks
articles.description:
Campbell said she's concerned by ICE's tactics, but cautioned that state authorities have little power over federal agents.

The post AG Campbell skeptical of proposed law to ban ICE agents from wearing masks appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: AG Maura Healey expresses skepticism about banning ICE agents from wearing masks.
Campbell highlights limited state power over federal agents like ICE.
Proposed law could affect local immigrant communities' interactions with federal enforcement.

articles.title: Birds of Paradise, Brighton’s travel-themed cocktail bar, closes at the Speedway
articles.description:
The bar located at the Charles River Speedway poured its final drink Oct. 31.

The post Birds of Paradise, Brighton’s travel-themed cocktail bar, closes at the Speedway appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Birds of Paradise cocktail bar in Brighton closed on October 31.
The bar was located at the Charles River Speedway.
Local residents lose a unique travel-themed nightlife option.

articles.title: The man who threw a sandwich at a federal agent says it was a protest. Prosecutors say it’s a crime.
articles.description:
“You could smell the onions and the mustard.”

The post The man who threw a sandwich at a federal agent says it was a protest. Prosecutors say it’s a crime. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Man threw a sandwich at a federal agent during a protest in Boston.
Prosecutors argue the act constitutes a crime under federal law.
Incident raises concerns about protest actions and legal repercussions for Boston residents.

articles.title: Red Sox sign outfielder Jarren Duran to one-year contract
articles.description:
The Red Sox star will remain in Boston through at least 2026.

The post Red Sox sign outfielder Jarren Duran to one-year contract appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox sign outfielder Jarren Duran to a one-year contract extension.
Duran will remain with the team in Boston through at least 2026.
This decision strengthens the Red Sox's roster for upcoming seasons.

articles.title: Child struck by school bus, driver arrested in Medway
articles.description:
The bus driver was charged with disorderly conduct relating to an incident after the crash, according to police.

The post Child struck by school bus, driver arrested in Medway appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A child was struck by a school bus in Medway on November 4.
The bus driver was arrested and charged with disorderly conduct.
This incident raises concerns about school bus safety for Boston families.

articles.title: TD Bank plans to shutter 6 Mass. branches amid nationwide closures
articles.description:
TD Bank says the closures are part of regular evaluations, and it plans to open new stores in these communities in the future.

The post TD Bank plans to shutter 6 Mass. branches amid nationwide closures appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: TD Bank will close 6 branches in Massachusetts as part of nationwide evaluations.
Future plans include opening new stores in these communities to maintain service.
Boston residents may face temporary inconvenience but will see new branch openings later.

articles.title: Longtime 7News anchor Kim Khazei is signing off
articles.description:
“Going back to 1994, this station has been my second home, and our viewers have been like family.”

The post Longtime 7News anchor Kim Khazei is signing off appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: 7News anchor Kim Khazei is signing off after 29 years with the station.
Khazei joined 7News in 1994, becoming a familiar face for Boston viewers.
Her departure marks the end of an era for local news in Boston.
